name: Milan Industries
overview:
Year of Establishment 2005. We are, “Milan Industries”, a reputed manufacturing and supplier firm with almost a decade of domestic experience and comprehensive outreach.

Enormous Production & Infrastructure: We are well equipped with one of the most advanced and sophisticated manufacturing unit. Our spacious unit is spread over a large piece of land in Kuvadva nearby Rajkot city, Gujarat in India.

Applications Paints & Coatings: Our grades of iron oxide is used in paints, marine coating and anti-fouling in which, shows better performance than other competitor’s synthetic iron oxide, also red iron oxide is ideal to be used in varnishes.

Construction & Ceramics: Synthetic iron oxide is suitable for making of cement and concrete products as well as in ceramics, roofing tile asphalt and paver block etc.

Plastic: Our Synthetic Iron Oxide is heat stable and hence ideal for use in the preparation of colour master batches for the plastic industry.

Architectural Products: Different shades of Iron Oxides are added to plasters and more to bring out the best of building exteriors and open up endless possibilities for designers.

Why Us: Milan Industries has almost a decade of providing cost effective and quality solutions to meet the diverse needs of our clients.
